update_plan.update_summary: The Integrated Learning component has been updated to include metadata tracking for training examples, improving data tracking and reporting capabilities.
key_changes: Metadata tracking has been added for 4 training examples distributed across 4 categories.
A log for the Integrated Learning system has been created and modified to improve monitoring and analysis.

specific_updates.README.md: Update the README file to reflect the addition of metadata tracking for training examples, and the impact this change will have on data tracking and reporting.
specific_updates.master_blueprint.md: Modify the master blueprint to include details about the updated configuration and changes made to the Integrated Learning component.
specific_updates.current_status.json: Update the current status file to reflect the modification of the configuration examples and the addition of metadata tracking.
